resources.string: To view Order status click on below button.
Your Order has been placed Successfully
Looks like you haven\'t made your menu yet.
* Pick-up your food once you get order confirmation from restaurent.
* Just relax, Our delivery agent will take care and deliver food to your door step.
Please keep exact change of payment amount to help us.
Pay with Debit card , Credit Card , Internet Banking and Wallets
Refer and Earn Rs 50 fr successful Refferal.
Any instructions ? Ex:- Like extra ketchup
